channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Best Deals From Huckberry’s 2025 Black Friday Sale
item.description: Huckberry’s Black Friday sale features deals on an eclectic curation of travel clothing, coffee gear, and lock-pick training kits (seriously).

item.title: 6 Best Mesh Wi-Fi Systems (2025), Tested in a Tech Reviewer's Home
item.description: Forget about patchy internet connections and dead spots in the house. These WIRED-tested multiroom mesh systems will get you online in no time.

item.title: Anduril’s autonomous weapons stumble in tests and combat, WSJ reports
item.description: Defense tech startup Anduril Industries has faced numerous setbacks during testing of its autonomous weapons systems, according to new reporting by th...

item.title: The Best Apple Black Friday Deals (2025)
item.description: If your AirPods, Apple Watch, or MacBook is on its last legs, now is the time to upgrade.

item.title: Our Favorite Unbound Merino Wool T-Shirts Are on Sale for Black Friday
item.description: WIRED’s pick for the best travel T-shirt is on sale for Black Friday. Expand your merino wardrobe with these deals. Hurry though, the sale ends tonigh...

item.title: Don't Get Suckered by Black Friday Laptop Deals. Just Get the MacBook Air (2025)
item.description: The Black Friday MacBook deal isn't the one you might assume it is. After testing every model, here's my advice on which to buy right now.

item.title: This Thanksgiving’s real drama may be Michael Burry versus Nvidia
item.description: Is Burry the canary in the coal mine, warning of a collapse that's inevitable? Or could his fame, his track record, his now unrestricted voice, and a ...

item.title: The future will be explained to you in Palo Alto
item.description: On Wednesday evening at PlayGround Global in Palo Alto, some very smart people who are building things you don’t understand yet will explain what’s co...

item.title: Glīd won Startup Battlefield 2025 by building solutions to make logistics simpler, safer, and smarter
item.description: We're excited to interview the winner of Startup Battlefield 2025, and Glid co-founder Kevin Damoa, on this week's Build Mode!

item.title: Best iPad apps for unleashing and exploring your creativity
item.description: We’ve compiled a list of some of the best iPad apps for creativity that are available on the App Store.
